comment: When two players have castled on opposite sides of the board the most important thing is to seize the attack as quickly as possible. This old rule is as valid today as it was in the "good old days". In the present case, Black already has an open file for hit Rooks, so it is up to White to obtain an open file for his Rooks as soon as possible. He chooses the best method
